2164.subject: MSCI
2164.descrlong:
Students use CSUMB's small trailerable research vessels as platforms for off-shore environmental sampling, ROV operations, scuba diving, and other boat-based marine and fresh water research techniques. Prior small boat certification required. A course fee may be required. Credit/ No Credit Available.

[Prereq: (MSCI 270 or MSCI 271) and (PHYS 150 or PHYS 220)]
